comments.body: Can you add `name='test-changeme'` to this test for `vlan 5`?  Tests that 3 of the properties are updated and one is not.

I added a name attr to vlan 8 instead. 
I'm using vlan 5 name attr to test ignoring existing attrs with merge, as well as cleaning up unspecified attrs with replaced/overridden.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +108,112 @@        playbook = dict(config=[
            dict(vlan_id=4),
            dict(vlan_id=5, mapped_vni=555, mode='ce'),
            dict(vlan_id=7, mapped_vni=777, name='test-vlan7', enabled=False),
            dict(vlan_id='8', state='active', name='test-changeme-not')

comments.body: How does deleted work for this module?  Does it only delete vlans that are specified in the playbook or does it delete all vlans?
When `config` is specified it removes only the vlans specified by config. When not specified it removes all vlans. I'll include a test for that too.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +133,137 @@            'no vlan 8'
        ]
        playbook['state'] = 'deleted'
        set_module_args(playbook, ignore_provider_arg)
        self.execute_module(changed=True, commands=deleted)
